channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel’s famed VC Jon Medved, diagnosed with ALS, backed the tech that will improve his life
item.description: In perhaps the last public interview of one Israel's most famous VCs, Jon Medved tells TechCrunch how tech will enhance his life.

item.title: What Is Lossless Audio, and Do You Really Need It?
item.description: Lossless audio is the first step toward audio nirvana. But what is it, does it really make a difference, and how can you get it? Here’s what to know.

item.title: 5 Best Monitors for the Mac Mini (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: The Mac Mini is a fantastic little computer, but you'll need one of these great monitors to complete the setup.

item.title: Research Reveals the Optimal Way to Optimize
item.description: The leading approach to the simplex method, a widely used technique for balancing complex logistical constraints, can’t get any better.

item.title: As EU waters down 2035 EV goals, electric startups express concern
item.description: The future may be electric, but that future is being postponed. The European Commission, citing the need for flexibility, has softened its ambitious p...

item.title: Waymo suspends service in San Francisco as robotaxis stall during blackout
item.description: Waymo suspended its SF robotaxi service on Saturday evening after a massive blackout appeared to leave many of its vehicles stalled on city streets.

item.title: 8 Best Planners of 2026: Roterunner, Hobonichi, Kokuyo
item.description: Digital tools are not always superior. Here are some WIRED-tested paper agendas and notebooks to keep you on track.

item.title: 8 Best Space Heaters (2025): Tested, Measured, and Mistreated
item.description: These portable heaters will heat a room quickly, quietly, and safely.

item.title: ‘It felt so wrong’: Colin Angle on iRobot, the FTC, and the Amazon deal that never was
item.description: The iRobot founder opens up about the 18-month regulatory process that he says doomed the Roomba maker -- and what it means for American innovation.

item.title: Google and Apple reportedly warn employees on visas to avoid international travel
item.description: Law firms representing Google and Apple have reportedly warned that employees who need a visa stamp to re-enter the United States should avoid leaving...
